name: Land, Air and Sea Eco Trip
description: You get to enjoy the clean and peaceful Camiguin - the Island born of Fire! Discover the wonderful underwater ecosystem by diving or snorkeling around White Island sand bar or around the powdery coral white sand of Mantigue, climb the mountains and get fascinated with their waterfalls and natural hot springs and cold springs, go zipline, enjoy fresh sea foods. Also, get fascinated with the history of the island when the volcano errupted over a hundred years ago.
